Name Rascal/Libraries/Benchmark/cpuTime

Function
  1. int cpuTime()
  2. int cpuTime(void () block)
Description
  1. Current cpu time in nanoseconds since the start of the thread that runs the code that calls this function.
  2. The cpu time in nanoseconds used by the execution of the code block.
